synopsis.text: Touko Amano and Konoha Inoue form an exclusive duo in their high school literature club. After the last bell rings, they convene to receive writing prompts from Touko, which Konoha must transform into a short story within a mere fifty minutes, serving as Touko's daily literary indulgence. On occasion, Konoha spots Touko engrossed in a book while navigating her way to school. One fateful day, he joins her in the library, where she invites him to craft a tale, leading them into captivating discussions about literature and vivid flights of imagination.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
